original_text: And the hail smote throughout all the land of Egypt all that was in the field, both man and beast; and the hail smote every herb of the field, and brake every tree of the field.
korean_text: 우박이 애굽 온 땅에서 사람과 짐승을 막론하고 밭에 있는 모든 것을 쳤으며 우박이 또 밭의 모든 채소를 치고 들의 모든 나무를 꺾었으되

sentences.original_text: And the hail smote throughout all the land of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우박이 이집트 온 땅에 내려쳤고

sentences.original_text: all that was in the field
and the hail smote every herb of the field
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우박이 밭의 모든 풀을 내려쳤고

sentences.original_text: and brake every tree of the field
